content.detailedDescription:
I was outside finishing up a cigarette before heading inside to work,i looked up and seen a large black triangle with 3 lights one on each tip that did not flash nor blink. there was one red light in the center that would sort of go dim and then back on,like a dimmer switch does. there was no noise and it just glided over. 

i would have thought it was a stealth bomber,but after calling two near by air force bases today they confirmed there was no way it could have been a stealth,i guess they have good reason for knowing that. i'm not sure what this could have been...But i know what i seen!
content.summary: Triangle shape 3 white lights on each tip and 1 red  in center

content.detailedDescription:
August 29th 2011 9 pm until well after midnight (had work so had to go to sleep) we seen 27+ (so many we lost count) star like objects moving very fast across the sky,at about star height.They changed direction,hovered and would disappear,there was no sound. 
this was in smyrna,tn. bent tree subdivision. including myself there was 4 witnesses. ages 20 to 60. we also seen a couple of regular planes go over but they were at plane height well below the star objects.

i am working on getting a good high quality camera that will film these,this has been going on for awhile but last night there were more than i had ever seen!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 27+ moving star like objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was near my house, coming from the university, and i decided to walk across a space of grass, it was at 7:15 pm. perfect clime. suddenly i saw (i though it was a star) something moving very slowly, but it was close because the clouds was more higher than that thing!! i was looking for another witness on the area, but i was the only one.... but i saw another thing on the north, like a cellphone with green, red and orange lights... and it was like 10 or 15 kilometers from where i was watching those things.. i stay 10 minutes if suddenly something happened next, but it just hovered the area..... and i had to go to my house...... i don���t know what are those objets.... but i can say that isn���t human!! i'm not exaggerating!!!!


peace everyone!!

sorry if my english is not good :) but all the world needs to know the ufo's are real!
content.summary: 2 ufos sighted in bogotá, colombia!!

content.detailedDescription: In southwestern pa observed two objects high in the sky.  one of the objects came to a stop and the other came up to the stopped object and stopped as well. then the both accelerated with tremendous speed and went in opposite directions and were gone from sight in seconds.
content.summary: In southwestern pa observed two objects high in the sky. then the both accelerated with tremendous speed and went in opposite directions and were gone from sight in seconds

content.detailedDescription:
August 27 2011 flying object witnessed by 5 people from 3 am until about 5:30 am.
we were in the backyard,the sky was very clear and so many stars were out so we decided to get a blanket and lay out and stargaze. we seen 3 shooting stars in about 10 minutes time. then with 30 minutes we seen about 7 to 8 shooting stars(maybe more) as i lost count because it was really something to see. i began to question was this normal? next we witnessed a star moving,the light looked different from a regular star,it's hard to explain because i have never seen a light source like it. possibly similar to the cars with the blueish halogen lights,if you take away the blue hue it was something like that,very vivid,very clear unlike any light i have ever seen. at first it moved across the sky in almost a serpentine motion and very fast,we have 2 acres of treed land here so we had to run through the yard to follow it as to not lose it behind a treetop. it then stopped and hovered and then shot across the sky at a very high speed,like a shooting star,then it appeared to be searching with the snake like movement going side to side as if it was looking for something. my mind couldn't believe what my eyes were seeing. now i think that some if not all of the shooting stars that we witnessed may have been this object all along. we ended up watching it and running all around the yard for 2 hrs+ it was almost as if the thing was playing with us i know that sounds weird,but it would hover wait for us to run over across the yard and then zip off stop and wait and then move... just very odd to me.
there seemed to be 3 of these,sometimes they would move so fast it was hard to keep up with more than 1.
the sky was extremely clear that night,the moon did not show up until just before sunrise,not sure why that is? but i believe it was about 6% full when it did show.
naturally, we were all tired from this event so we said our goodbyes and i went in to sleep not long after that a military jet the ones that make the sonic boom noise went over and shook my house.I suspect they were looking for these object(s).
i searched all weekend trying to find a video of something like what we witnessed and i came across one that is exactly like what we seen on youtube. the man known as (magnetflipper) uses a high powered camera and has actually captured 60+ video's of these things.
notes* 
-the moving star stayed high in the sky maybe slightly under the stars
-time seemed to speed up, it seemed like we were outside like 45 mins to an hour we had no idea that it was 5:30ish am until it started getting light outside and we lost the object and someone looked at the actual time.
-object(s) moved at incredible speeds with precision movements
-there was no sound
-we did see 2 planes go over during this time, but they were much lower in relation to the object we were watching
-sometimes it looked like a aura was around the object when it was just hovering
-when it would zip off it left a slight trail like a shooting star but the streak would hold a little longer than that of a shooting star giving us time to see where it zipped off to, the trail looked blueish white in color.
-for the record we were not drinking nor doing drugs,we don't do that anyway but i suspect someone will ask...I know i would if i read this. just saying.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving star like object

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had just turned off the tv in our room and got ready to go to sleep.  after a short time (5-10minutes) i got up to relieve myself in our master bathroom.  it was at this time i observed through my bathroom window a some what large pulsating red orb in the sky to the east/north east of my location.  the object appeared to be a considerable distance away (at least three miles)and about the size of a silver dollar.  i could hear no rotor wash or engines of any kind.  as i observed the object it immediately struck me as odd.  it literally moved slowly on a straight trajectory and then would zip backwards, forwards, up and down. my area of view is limited by several trees.  the observed object stayed within a my clear 15' field of vision for close to two and a half minutes.  it is during this period the object seemed to linger,hover and change location in a millisecond.  the object was pulsing bright red with hints of orange and white.
at this point i'm in disbelief of what i'm seeing, so i called out to my wife to hurry and come look.  the object was moving once again on its original trajectory very slowly and was beginning to leave our clear field of vision.  as it moved behind the trees it struck me how bright this object was that it could still be made out through the trees.  at this point i feared losing sight of the object and threw on minimal clothes and grabbed my camera to head outside.  once i got out i searched the sky for the object but could not sight it.  i still have a sense of disbelief in what i saw.  it was unlike anything i have ever observed in the sky.  it is worth mentioning i served in the us army as a cavalry scout and received intensive training in observing and identifying all types of aircraft and armored vehicles.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strangest thing i have ever seen.  left me doubting what i saw..

content.detailedDescription: I had just completed a yearly physical with my primary care physician. upon exiting the medical building i turned left towards my parked automobile. it is a beautiful day outside with extremely pleasant conditions. i simply glanced up into the sky in appreciation when i immediately noticed a clear and unmistakable object stationary and flashing brightly in the sky... i paused because it required no momentum to stay air borne. my first thought was is it a "star"? but at 2:00pm in the bright afternoon, no way. not like this. what really caught my attention was the objects spinning motion. i watched for minutes. it just hung there spinning. i thought, how can anybody not see this? i had enough time to observe that the bright flashing was created by the reflection of the sun to my right. looking up, the spinning was clock wise. as it rotated about, certain sections of it were angled slightly differently. this created a varying degree of brightness per flash and size. i took all this in. very fascinating... now the remarkable part. i watched as a passing cloud slowly began to approach the object. they seemed to be at the same elevation. suddenly, as the cloud got nearer, the leading edge of the cloud began to be "pulled forward", like a "whipping towards". the closer the cloud approached the more of it was pulled or effected rather by the spinning of the object. the cloud was violently stirred clock wise into a whirlpool around the object. amazing! when i say violently i mean that the interaction of the cloud and the object began slow then increased as more of the cloud entered its area. it was incredible to see the cloud so peacefully floating along with the leading edge being swirled so fast. the leading edge of the cloud swirled around the object as the cloud engulfed it. i watched several more minutes for the whole cloud to pass in anticipation of observing the object again but it was gone. seems that once in the cloud it disappeared, at least from my view. i checked today's weather and the cloud elevation is 12000 feet. meaning this object was big and so was its effect.
content.summary: Spinning unidenified hovering object creates vortex in passing cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
A few months ago i had back surgery for the third time in 3 years so i like to rest and relax my back in the backyard at my forest park il home on nice clear warm starry nights like last night aug 29 2011 i was sky watching as i usually do when i noticed a dull orange orb fly over heading south east at 830 pm cdt. i did not have my camcorder but went inside to get it because i know that sometimes when you see one ufo others might be sure to follow. so i waited and sure enough another flew over at the same height, distance, color and speed. i had my camcorder so i started recording. i followed it until it disappeared in the south east chicago sky. i lit a cigarette and waited to see if anymore would show. about 5 mins later at 845 pm another larger brighter orb showed and started in the same path as the others but deviated dimmed out and vanished when a regular aircraft began to fly at it. none of the orbs that flew over had the required faa rotating beacon lights. i have been watching the skies over chicago for a few years now and have seen many types of craft of various shape size and color but the star like orbs seem to be the most frequently visible. 

i have a youtube channel where i post my videos of what i catch. i call the youtube channel guttergawker, i named it this long ago before i began to see ufos. i called it that because i would sit at work and watch all kinds of stuff on youtube and my friend would say "why are you always looking at the gutter?! you're just a regular guttergawker!" so i decided to call my channel that. anyways one of the friends i made on youtube who live in the chicago-land area emailed me maybe 10 minutes after i saw these orbs fly over saying they had just witnessed similar orbs pass over including two dull ones and a third bright one, not knowing i recorded what they saw 10 minutes earlier. it was pretty cool and amazing to have someone else validate what i had just witnessed but in another part of the city. they said they lived near california and archer which is se from where i am located in forest park. if you want to check out the video search bright ufo chicago august 29 2011 or search my channel name. if you go on youtube and have a sign on and live in the chicago area and see the same things in the sky please email me i would like to start networking with other people to see if we can begin to catch these same events in various locations in il. 

i promised i would not make another mufon report a while ago because some in the ufo community think that people that have multiple encounters numerous times are full of it but i am here to say that's not true. everything i see the reports i make and the videos i capture are all sincere and honest. i have 25 videos on my channel so check out the different things i caught on tape. some of the things may be explainable and a little artsy but most of the videos are recorded and uploaded without any enhancement and are open to the viewers interpretation. i am under the strong impression that the things i see are extraterrestrial i believe this only from the first hand experiences i have had. some have been very up close and revealing. idk why i continue to see these things but i know i am not the only one. i think they target me to show themselves because the first time i saw the ufos aug 23 2009 i said a small prayer, thought positive and asked them to please come down and show their technology and knowledge with us to help humans end war, poverty, sickness, homelessness, etc. i think they were able to hear my thoughts and that positive thinking resonated with them so now when they are around they continue to "show" themselves to me. thanks for taking the time to read my report. hopefully someone will be able to tell us what these things are someday. peace.
content.summary: Starting at 830pm saw 3 orbs pass over in 5 minute intervals hd video

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from big sur on the 101 about 40 minutes north of santa barbara.  looked into the sky, and noticed a bright blu light that eithr apreared or was already there and it decended at a 45 degreee angle very quikly and out of site behind a mountain.  (ocean was on the other side of the mountain)  very fast, probably decended a mile or more in under 2 seconds.
content.summary: Blue orb light descending extremly fast at a 45 degree angle over mountain disepering on the other side

content.detailedDescription: I have a boat moored in port jefferson, long island. as hurricane irene approached ny i found a cctv camera that is about 5 miles from my boat to monitor the storm, flooding, wind..... the camera i was monitoring is at defeo marina and can be viewed live at their website. at about 2:30 pm on sunday i logged into the camera to check the flood conditions. i witnessed a large silver round disc type object in the sky over the flooded bay. i watched it live for a few minutes as it hovered in the same spot rotating around. my first thought was that someone might be launching a weather balloon but i soon realized that the object had lines and a structure that didn't look like a balloon. i took 3 screenshots of the live camera view. the 3 screenshots were taken about 10 seconds apart. it appears in the pictures that you can see the craft rotating toward the camera. i spoke to the marina to see if the live cam is recorded but it is not. at the time of this sighting most of the area was evacuated and no planes were flying in or out of ny airports.
content.summary: Silver craft over flooded long island bay during hurricane irene

content.detailedDescription: Last night around 9:15 i went to smoke a cig. on my front porch before heading to bed. i have a traight shot of open sky off my front porch and could see a light that looked like a bright star. then it started moving closer towards my house and it kept getting brighter and brighter. it was all alone until it was almost over my house then it seemed like out of no where 2 airplane like figures appeared beside it and behind it, constinantly changing positons. the airplanes had red and green lights on the side. i convinced myself it was just two planes meeting up with something else to refuel. i snapped two different pics. one as it was approaching my house, which in the picture, you can see it was going fast enough to cause i tail behing it. then another when it was above my house. the photo on my phone just made it look like a dot on my small cell screen but when i uploaded it on my computer you can see it is a circle and very bright. there were tons of stars out last night and none of them were bright enough for my camera to pic up but this is clear as day. it went over the hill behind my house and i went inside assuming it was gone. so i posted something on facebook about it and 20 minutes later my neighbor replied they went outside and looked and it was there again, followed by someone 2 miles in the opposite dierction of where i last saw the "thing" headed that it was also over their house. that is what really got me thinking. it if were jets refueling would they be circling a town or headed in a straight path to their destination. i don't know much about that kind of stuff, but i would bet money that was not plaines refueling, the light on this object was almost as if it were a high powered search light but the light never pointed down to the ground it just surround the object
content.summary: Very bright circle light in pa

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my deck watching an unusual number of planes in the sky. these planes were accompanied by strange lights that seemed to appear out of nowhere, flutter around for a few moments, and then disappear. it was a very clear night, no cloud cover. after awhile, all the lights and planes had gone and i suddenly noticed a huge, bright ball of light ascending from behind the treeline. at first i thought it was a low flying plane coming at me head on, but this object made no noise, was rising very slowly, and did not blink. in fact, the light never fluctuated - no twinkling or blinking. it was so low that if it had been a plane it would have been very loud, but this was silent. i watched for about 5 minutes as it slowly rose and then moved directly over my house. i was in awe at the low altitude, the silence, the unwavering outline of a sphere with a slightly domed top, and the bright gold color with a hint of red in the middle. as it flew over my house, i was looking directly up at it (maybe an 80 degree angle) and it began to shrink. it got smaller and smaller until it turned into a tiny red dot about the size of a star, and it was gone. it went from a giant ball of light to a red dot to nothing in less than 5 seconds. it vanished into thin air. the sky was clear as could be, and there was nothing obstructing my view. it just disappeared. it was not a plane. it was not a meteor. it was not natural. it was very disturbing. i am reporting this because i believe that other people must have seen this. it seemed to parallel the susquehanna river in northumberland pa around 10 pm.
content.summary: Bright ball of light (bright gold with red in the middle) solid outline, moved slowly across sky, turned into red star and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
On august 28th 2011 i went out on my back deck to stargaze. we live in a rural area and the milky way is viewable here. the sky is very clear and stars are very bright.  i noticed one particular star low on the horizon north west from my location 39' 19' 39'n, 120' 10 57w which was pulsating blues, reds and whites. i grabbed my binoculars and with the increased magnification, could confirm this was not a star, planet or aircraft. the lights were being produced by the object and were not a reflection.

i called my wife out to look and she observed the same thing. the object never moved and remained hovering in place for 2 hours. i eventually went to bed, but before that i reported what i saw to my friends list on fb.

on august 29th at 8:30pm, we observed the same object in the same relative place again, but also another had appeared due west just over the horizon. this one was larger or closer. after several minutes, we noticed a large amount of aircraft heading in that direction.  we could only see the lights on the planes, but they were identical with one red blinking center light and two white lights, one on each wing.  within 10 minutes, the northwest object disappeared below the horizon (behind the mountain, we have a range between us and the objects). the object due west began moving north in the sky and then dropped behind the mountain. it moved very slowly.

a friend in a town about 5 miles from me, who doesn't have the same mountain range obstruction as i do, called to tell me he saw both objects pairing up and moving north.

after about 30 minutes, we found 8 more of the same objects in the south west sky. four of them were paired up individually and one was brighter than the rest and more west. 

two friends in cold springs nevada also observed the objects. one friend saw just one object and he said it vanished as he was viewing it.  the other friend viewed one object this morning at 5:30am.  both friends described the objects the same way we saw them from here.  star-like, pulsating very bright blue, red and white lights.
content.summary: Two nights of observing star-like objects very high in the atmosphere with pulsating colors.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north bound on i-79 from fairmont, wv toward morgantown around 9:00 pm on friday evening, july 29th. my husband and son were also in the car with me.

off in the distance, off to the southbound side of the interstate, i saw three white flashing lights. i first thought them to be a radio tower because of their distance from one another and because they appeared to be stationary in the sky. i mentioned to my husband that i did not recall a radio tower being there.

i kept watching the lights as they seemed to be getting larger. after a few seconds we all noticed that they were in fact moving. after a few seconds more, the lights were directly over our car and seemed to be hovering there. they appeared to be extremely low in the sky as well. 

when they first appeared over the car, all we could see were the lights; there were now also well more than three, perhaps six or eight, though we did not count. 

we really could not imagine what it was as the lights seemed to remain directly over vehicle for at least 4-5 seconds, with no noise. after several seconds we saw a faint outline of what looked like a commercial airliner. we chuckled and dismissed it at first, however i quickly pointed out that i have never seen or heard about an airplane with lights on the underbelly.

because we did see the distinct outline of an airplane after it was over head for several seconds, my husband and son were convinced it was just an ordinary airplane. i do believe that it was an airplane however, certainly a very odd one which seemed to move extremely slow and low and with lights covering the underside of the fuselage.

i tried googling such an airplane and was unable to find any. i did however find two other similar sightings to mine. so i decided to contact you to report my sighting also.
content.summary: What appeared to be an airplane with several lights covering underside of the fuselage.

content.detailedDescription:
It was just before dark and i was laying on the sofa recuperating from a knee injury. my husband was on the computer in our dining room. suddenly we both heard an extremely loud whistle like noise right outside our dining room patio doors. my husband immediately went outside on our deck and looked up to just above the tree tops to see mostly the bottom of a large object. he said it was pulsating randomly with an opalescence color. it flew in an east to west direction and was gone in under a minute. by the time i was able to get up off the sofa, it was gone. my husband spent his military service in the air force. he said he couldn't explain what he saw or heard. i thought at the time, the whistle noise sounded as if air was rushing by an opening very fast, as if "someone" left a window or door open on the craft. it was the strangest experience i've ever had, and i think i can say the same for my husband, who actually saw what we heard. 
at the same time, my son was riding in a car along st rt 77 which runs in an east to west direction, when a friend pointed out an object in the sky and asked "what's that?" they didn't report hearing a noise.
content.summary: A large object flew almost directly above our house which made no engine noise but was emmiting an extremely loud whistle noise

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside and saw the lights. it took a while to get my phone out but i got a video of it. i would rather talk in person or over the phone.
content.summary: I was standing outside and saw the lights. it took a while to get my phone out but i got a video of it. i would rather talk in person or over the phone.

content.detailedDescription: While on patrol i observed a huge but stationary object. all i could see was red and blue maybe green flashing lights. it had a bright light or tail but it was shooting high above it and below it. it appeared out of no where. i watched for about an hour until first morning sun light and it disappeared simply as it had appeared. the tail shooting above and below must have been over a mile long as it sat high up in the night sky. i have seen this once before and it was about a month ago. this is facing due east but some degrees towards the south.
content.summary: Observed huge pulsating red and blue light in night sky

content.detailedDescription: Last night my wife and i saw several amber colored lights hovering and changing formations, i.E. boomerang, diamond and v shapes as well as lining up vertically, three to four ships at a time. the ufo's would move in an erratic jerking motion as they moved through the sky as well as when they hovered. in all there was at least ten ships visible at a time. some of them were just beneth the clouds hovering or gradually moving in an erratic almost bouncing motion. there were numerous others that were flying in all directions, trying to mimic airplanes and helicopters. one ship flew over top of us at a height of about one hundren feet. it made a sound unlike anything i have ever heard. it hummed and sounded like a blimp and a helicopter at the same time but nowhere near as loud as the real thing,(i grew up very close to pitts. international airport and am familiar with both airplanes and helicopters). as the vehicle passed overhead we seen that it was a triangle shaped craft with two red lights on the backone on each side and a pulsating white light on the front that alternated to an amber color. the craft flew overhead at about one hundren feet from the ground and went southwest until out of sight. this is the second sighting that i have had the first being on june third in monaca pa.Both sightings were similar in many ways i.E., light colors and patterns,flight characteristics of the craft, and the shapes that were formed at higher altitudes, as if in a holding pattern, gradually moving sideways while erratically jumping or bouncing and then returning to the starting point. tonight was with out a doubt the single most amazing and scarry thing that i have ever witnessed. i have always believed in the existance of ufo's and alien life but this incident has made me a true believer.I guarentee that we are not the only people that seen this happen and hope that someone can get back to me to let me know if it was reported by others. anyone who looked up and has any kind of common sense, noticed that something very odd was happening.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: My wife and i were sitting in a large field by our home star gazing when we witnessed several ufos with amber, white,and red colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I one day in the summer of 2011 began meditating on my roof and unintentionally began stargazing. i was with some friends and we began to notice that some of the stars were moving around in a zig zag pattern. the more we looked at them the more drastic the stars movement. well suddenly more stars starting magically coming in from the horizon. we then knew they weren't stars. we watched them move and interact with our requests for hours and hours pausing every few moments to ask each other if this was really happening.

now we see these lights almost every night. however, it seems we have almost developed a relationship with these beings. everyone always experiences similar feelings of warmth and joy and overall peacefulness. really an amazing experience. there are now many many people in this area that have been shown these craft and everybody has had many different personal experiences. i myself along with others have seen the "moving stars" as i before mentioned, but also what appear to be satellites moving across the sky. however these "satellites" can stop motion in an instant and immediately change direction. also what appear to be meteors shooting across the sky occur every so often while we try to make contact (often multiple craft manifest this way during this type of sighting).

it is important to note that these sightings occur very often and happen right next to the university of oklahoma campus. anyone that is in the vicinity should keep an eye on the sky. we do not claim to know much about what happens, but we do know that it is very real and these intelligent craft are here for peaceful reasons and to communicate with us. i hope this can help some people out.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufos disguised as stars and satellites abundant

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:50pm on 8.28.11 the first witness spotted a bright, large light in the sky while having a cigarette. at first it appeared stationary just below the treeline in the distance, like a star. the light then moved upwards in the sky, startled the witness, and caused them to seek out a second witness (myself.) when i went outside i saw the light, very bright and much larger than the stars. upon seeing it and it's location, i promptly checked the nasa website, a "star walk" app that shows what bodies (stars, planets, satellites, etc) are visible in the sky that night using gps, checked other resources online, and none of them showed anything that would be that large and visible at night. there were no planets, bright stars, or man made objects located in that part of the sky at that time. after a few minutes of watching the object, it started flashing. it would go dim, then come back bright. go completely dark/ disappear, then come back bright. it did this for about 5-7 minutes. i got a video of it that covers a 3 minute duration of the pulsing. i was holding the camera by hand, so i was shaking it, but the pulsing wasn't caused by myself. after it stopped pulsing i got my tripod and set the camera up and snapped a few pictures of it. with the naked eye it looked mostly white with the slightest color changes and the slightest sparkle of other colors. on the digital pictures with them zoomed in, i could see that it was emitting a greenish glow, sometimes also emitting purple and a blue'ish tone as well. i had the camera on the lowest shutter speed and used a timer taking them so i would not shake them and so that the camera would absorb as much of the color as possible. after taking the pictures i looked at it for a little while and went inside. at about 1am i went back outside to see where it was and found it had moved a bit higher in the sky and to the left of where it was. at that point, it was flashing. it went completely dark instantly, then after a second or 2 it came right back. it did this three times. i returned inside again for a little while, returning back outside at approximately 2am. it was now slightly higher again, but this time it was far to the right of where we had seen it originally. it was checked one more time about a half an hour after that and it was seen very high in the sky, back toward the center of where it was originally seen again. this was the last time any of the witnesses checked the object, and it was gone by daybreak. upon reviewing the pictures i had taken, i noticed the object appeared to have changed shapes slightly from picture to picture. i know this was not a blur or my own mistake because stars can be seen in the background as single, crisp pixels. while looking at the object itself and the pictures even after, i had an eery feeling that this object was something unlike anything i had seen before. i had an odd feeling that it wasn't anything human made.  it drew me in and scared me at the same time. even now i really don't know what to think about the sighting.I took as many pictures as i could on the camera batteries because i felt like it was something that needed to be shared. i just had a feeling in the pit of my stomach that the object i saw was something new to me. something i may never see again, but something i won't forget.
content.summary: An object was spotted hovering and moving through the sky for hours after hurricane

content.detailedDescription: If you guys want to film ufos you need to come to new york now. i have seen an increase of ufo activity in my area for the past three months. they are flying really low. there is a huge star like object in the sky that doesnt move but every since it started appearing so did the ufos. i have never in my entire life seen so many ufos my wife didnt believe and now she is a believer after only one sighting. i saw another one tonight it was flying really low and fast. it had a brown glow to it. it glowed in the dark but it wasnt like a star or anything i have ever seen. this thing was really low and in the shape of a sphere with a brown almost reddish glow but it was a really dark glow. please come to nyc i will show you were to put the cameras to record. you are missing a lifetime oppertunity. i have checked on the nasa website the closet planet was mercury and it was not suppose to be visible by the naked eye. so what is this star that is about 15 percent the size of the moon. this thing is huge and no one is talking about it. it shows up in the sky after 1 am. please call me for any questions and you are more than welcome to come and record at my house. i will show you were i see them every night. my camera sucks i have tried recording but you cant see nothing. i have seen two ufos obsorb each other and then split moving up and down. even glowing really bright like the size of a basketball in the sky. i can go on and on about how many sighting im seeing every night. please contact. i am very concerned for the safety of this country. these ufos are flying really low at high speeds. ther are flying about 400 ft above the building and the building in queens are not high they are very low.
content.summary: Look up nyc!!!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
July 4th, 2011. 10pm. clear skies. 

located in the backyard of my house watching fireworks with my wife, kids and parents. my wife/mom and i watched red/orange orbs flying across the sky sometimes coming to a complete stop and hovering in the sky for moments at a time, then all of a sudden continuing on thier path. every one of them flying off not fast but visible until they became so small in the backround you could no longer track where they've gone to. two times i witnessed 2 different orbs flying side by side or rather top/bottom; flying just above the trees in the distance that were also visible until distance became a factor and you could no longer see them. 


i first noticed these orbs as fireworks were going off in the skies, saying to myself "i've never seen a firework burn that long in my life" "what the heck is that?" the whole situation seemed abnormal to me considering i've never seen a firework fly "pre-determined paterns".

single orbs and 2 pairs of orbs made themselves visable more then a few times while my family and i stood there in awe as watching red/orange orbs fly smoothly across the sky sometimes remaining completly stationary for various periods from 5-15 minutes at a time, then continuing on thier way.

at the time of the sightings i knew the situation wasn't normal at all. i knew they weren't fireworks, aircraft, weather baloons, flares or any other explanation that i have heard or read about over the years. my first gut reaction was to grab a camera, considering i do not own a video camera. i burst in the house grab a cellular phone which was the only thing handy at the time that was quick and easy. ran back outside and began taking picture after picture. doing this made the activity increase it seemed, after the first 3 pictures had been taken and the orbs flew about thier path, a pair all of a sudden showed up just above the tree line behind my house traveling very slowly, as if they knew i was taking pictures. staying steady on thier path just above the tree line, i watched them move steadily until no longer visable. at this time my parents were getting a bit uneasy and decided to go inside. my wife and i continued to watch the skies capturing a total of 18 quality pictures of all these strange round star-like red/orange glowing orbs. i never became uneasy during the entire situation, my only thought was "i gotta get it, i gotta get it".
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red/orange orbs in the 4th of july sky. celebration turned investigation.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside talking to my mom, and i just happened to be facing east, when i noticed what appeared to be a plane flying behind a tree (11:54 pm, i look at my cell phone to see what time it is each time i see an unknown object in the sky), so at first i did not think much about it, but before i saw it, i had a strange feeling that i would see another ufo, but i was not sure if i should trust that feeling or not. as the object is passing behind the tree, my mom goes inside, and i looked at our '95 ford taurus to see if the windows were rolled up, and they were, so i looked back at the object behind the tree, and i could tell it was distinctly triangular, with a red blinking light between the center and the front, and three white lights, one at each point of the triangular shape. as it began to move roughly east-southeast of me, i could see that the back of the object had a panel of white lights that appeared to be strobbing from left to right and two white lights (not blinking) one on the left and one on the right. this is what immediately caught my attention, because back in 2004 i witnessed a simaler triangle that was much lower in altitude and appeared to be hovering, and it had a simaler light panel on the back with white lights strobbing from left to right. another familier part of this sighting was that it had no sound whatsoever, even at its closest distance and as it was moving away from me (if it was a jet, it should've had a roar from its jet engines). i went around behind our shed (south of the house) and watched it begin to bank slightly to the left, but did not change direction for some reason. as it got south-southwest of my location, it appeared to have stopped, and began to fade slowly (it was probably climbing in altitude causing it to do this). finally at 11:59 pm (i had my cell phone with me so i looked at the time to make a more accurate report) i lost sight of the object. i tried to take some pictures of the object, (i took 6 photos) but the object did not emit enough light for my camera to see. i did make a quick sketch of it though.
content.summary: Triangular object moving towards mount carmel.

content.detailedDescription: I went out with a friend of mine, to a park to watch the skies since the power was out everywhere nearby, and the only lights at the time were the occasional headlights of passing cars.  what i originally thought was a star, began flying round and round in large circles.  i took out my l.E.D. flashlight and tried to communicate by pointing & rapidly flashing light towards it to get it's attention.  when i took out my lighter, to light a cigarette, i tried to use both the lighter and l.E.D. flashlight to communicate, trying to convince it to land at the park.  it did not land, however, though i did notice that it began flying in whatever direction i held the flame.  if i held it to my right or left, it flew that way, and if i held it still, it stayed still.  it somehow continued this, as it flew steadily and slowly away from us.  once out of view, my friend left to go into the house, to tell his girlfriend about it.  she eventually came out to see, but before she did and while i was alone, i noticed that i was getting swooped by some sort of enormous black bird.  it made absolutely no sound, looked something like a bat, but was more the size of a large hawk or an eagle.  it continued swooping my head until my friend's girlfriend came out to see what was going on.  (i didn't see it again until she went back to the house later, and i was alone again.}  when she came out to see, she had already missed the first one..  i noticed another one by radio towers, which i also at first mistook for a star, not so much moving in nice circles like the first, but in more jerky directions.  i immediately began using my flashlight and my lighter, trying to get it's attention.  just like the first, this one began moving in whatever direction i held my lighter, but unlike the first, this one didn't seem to want to fly too far from the tower.  (when the power finally came on, i went inside and i never saw it leave.  it was still there when i went in.)  i tried my best to convince it to land, using the two light sources i had, but it never did.  the two of us watched it fly around for a while, and then she decided to go back inside.  after she left, and i was alone again, that huge silent bat-like bird began swooping my head again.  i still continued trying to communicate with the star-like craft, flashing my l.E.D. light at it, and finally i got a response..  i saw, in the woods, about a quarter mile from my location, and about a mile or so to the left of the towers, what appeared to be something resembling fireworks shooting straight up from the woods.  it was absolutely silent and far more beautiful.  fireworks, for example, shoot up to a certain height before exploding with a large bang, leaving smoke.  what i saw, was super bright pink, yellow, blue, purple, and green colored light which began from the ground and lit all at once like a totally silent, yet beautiful tower of rings and balls of bright light, with no smoke whatsoever.  then the same thing happened again, but this time it appeared to be closer to the the tower.  this one was even brighter and more magnificent, though, since it was further away from me and the location of the first lights, it appeared to be the same size.  (i went online that night, trying to find something similar, and the closest thing to what i saw, that i found on the web, is the huge multi-colored light show that happened in texas. on youtube, look up fantastic alien light show 5/11/11)  after that happened, i saw a helicopter fly over-head.  i couldn't tell whether it was black or not, but it seemed to be very interested in what was going on.  i also saw a plane fly by that had two red lights on it's wings, and a white light in front fly over-head.  at first, i didn't think anything was strange, until the red lights disappeared.  i don't know anything about planes, but i just thought i'd throw that in there in case it means something to somebody.  i tried to get a video from my phone, but i just got a new phone, and realized that it doesn't have that capability.  i did take pictures from my phone, but i can't zoom or anything and all i got was a super tiny dot on the screen.  sorry.
content.summary: 3 of us watched starlike crafts fly in crazy patterns, then i saw a light show

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my deck in manchester,ct around 11:30 pm when noticed a pulsating blue orb crossing the sky from west to east.It wasn't a plane or chopper because it was silent and there where no blinkung lights.I ran to see if i could record it with my camera but it was not possible.For me that was a ufo!!
thanks!!
content.summary: pulsating blue orb

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, appx 8:00 pm arizona time, i am a home renter and we have to smoke outside, i got up to go smoke in the backyard, i always look to the stars to see if its clear or cloudy, i happened to catch a star to my east direction brighter than normal, didnt think much of it, but it looked like a power surge, it got brighter then faded out to black, i called my girlfriend out who has very poor eyesight to say i just saw a wierd thing, then it reappeared and went from dim to very bright again, she actually saw it too and also told me she had seen something like that a week earlier but thought it was just her eye, i told her to grab my phone so i could video it, but it did not reappear, it was moving in a straight line somewhat north westerly, i am not crazy and i hope others saw it as well. other than fadeing in and out i didnt witness anything that made it unusual except it was brighter than any other star and it went black, we watched for several minutes more in the trajectory i would have imagined it would have traveled but nothing further.We both felt as if we had seen our first ufo together i am 41 years old and must say i was excited, and the fact that it was bright enough for her to see was great, she has very poor vision i am glad we both got to share this. i watched the trajectory of what i thought it would go but nothing. i am hoping others saw it as well and together we can all share in what we saw.
content.summary: Saw a star it went dim and faded out, called my gf, we both saw it reappear and get bright then fade back out, but farthur away from first sighting, in a straight line path, 0 clouds all stars were visible.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband saw something interesting tonights and aske dme to come outside. by the time i had gone out all i could see was a large orange-yellow light hanging above the horizon. this is what planes coming head on look like. they seem to hover forever but they are actually coming staight on. we live near latrobe airport, which takes commercial jets in and out so we're used to seeing planes of all shapes and sizes.
my husbad described that previeous to me coming out he say the object but in front of it, about two inches in length from our viewpoint, were two red, solid lights. the lights were ahead of the object and got bigger then suddenly disapeared.
i decided to stay out and observe the object which moved slowly above us. it made no sound until it was on top of us. it sounded like a plane and had blinking yellow and white lights. but what i noticed when it flew almost directly overhead, was that it was very black against the night sky and that it was a solid diamond shape. unlike planes that fly through here with a body wings and tail. this was, from wing-tip to wing-tip a slightly elongated diamond. i am sure it was man-made but the red lights in front of it were strange.
content.summary: Strange large red lights preceding plane?

content.detailedDescription: It was a star like sight. it moved slow in an ascending way out of sight. at steep angle. same as the two i saw the other night. not normal for our area and never seen anything like it. no aircraft i've seen could do what this craft did in the way it did. if it was man made, it was for space and id like to know more about it.
content.summary: Slow star-like slow deming ascent

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, i am the biggest ufo skeptic.

i was driving north on st. john road in dyer indiana at exactly 8:43 pm on august 28. i happened to just look at the sky (which was clear and without cloud cover) and looked around (south) and saw 8 huge orange balls floating in the sky. i stopped the car in disbelief and looked at them. i had the mindset to snap a few pictures. the orange balls seemed to be in a very constellation (with some distance between them) and move together west to east very slowly. i kept on snapping pictures. after 5 minutes or so of moving east, they faded out. i'm not sure if they were moving southeast and the fade was actually just the distance growing or actually faded out.

i didn't have any idea what the balls could have been when i saw them. they were in a zig zag constellation and moving in the same pattern across the sky.

the orange balls looked like halloween jack o lanterns in the sky. thinking back my reaction is that they were balloons with candles attached, but these were huge, and moving in a precise movement together. wind was not a factor for the globes.

as you can see in the picture, there was a good deal of distance between the globes, so i ruled out a blimp, airplane, etc. they were not blinking. solid orange until a fade out at the end that took about 5 seconds.

please email me, and let me know what you think.
content.summary: 8 orange balls over dyer, indiana

content.detailedDescription: I can remember very clearly what i saw.  unfortunately, it has been a number of years since it happened and i cannot remember the exact date.  i do know it was around christmas or thanksgiving of 2005, and may have been in january of 2006.  it was a very cold night, i had finished work late, as always, and was driving home around midnight.  the place i worked was in woodstock, va.  on that particular night i decided to drive down route 11 rather than take i-81 to toms brook where i lived at the time.  as i was driving i noticed an extremely bright pulsating light in the sky.  somehow it was different from anything i had seen before, i almost went off the road while staring at it.  i then pulled off the road so i could watch.  it was then that i noticed another pulsating light moving with the first that i had seen.  i realized then that it was not two objects that i was seeing, but one.  the pulsating lights seemed to be at the ends of something very long.  i noticed that it was extremely large.  it would turn in the sky, and then move closer.  it was very long and thin, i have no idea as to the actual dimensions of the object, all i know is that it was very large.  the lights were red and blue, and they pulsed very fast.  i finally managed to get back into the truck and continue driving home, but never stopped watching the thing out the window of the truck.  when i got home i rushed inside and got my brother to come out on the deck and see it as well.  there we observed several of them in the sky.  since that night i find that i am constantly looking up in the night sky looking for what i saw.  i have seen airplane lights and i know it is not the same.  they were so bright and pulsed very fast.  i just want to know if someone else saw it, and if there has ever been an explanation.  i have not spoken to many people about it, but i hope someone out there knows what it is.
content.summary: Driving home from work, saw something that shocked me
